links: W. Lang, On generalizations of Stirling number triangles, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 3 (2000), #00.2.4.
Vladimir Victorovich Kruchinin, Composition of ordinary generating functions, arXiv:1009.2565
formula: E.g.f. exp((-1+(1+x)^6)/6).a(n)=n!*sum_{k=1..n} sum_{j=0..k} binomial(6*j,n) *(-1)^(k-j)/ (6^k*(k-j)!*j!). [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Feb 07 2011]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
extensions: Offset adjusted by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 29 2009
